Sentencas: This paper examines an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) absorption beating and cooling system used for buildings.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: The integrated system can provide heating/cooling and/or hot water for buildings while consuming natural gas.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: The aim of this study is to give an overall description of the system.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: The possibility of such an integrated system is discussed and the configuration of the system is described.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: A system model is presented, and a specific case study of the system, which consists of a pre-commercial SOFC system and a commercial LiBr absorption system, is performed.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: In the case Study, the detailed configuration of an integrated system is given, and the heat and mass balance and system performance are obtained through numerical calculation.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: Based on the case study, some considerations with respect to system component selection, system configuration and design are discussed.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: Additionally, the economic and environmental issues of this specific system are evaluated briefly.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: The results show that the combined system demonstrates great advantages in both technical and environmental aspects.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings

Sentencas: With the present development trends in solid oxide fuel cells and the commercial status of absorption heating and cooling systems, it is very likely that such a combined system will become increasingly feasible within the following decade.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell system for buildings
